content: 1 In the second year of Darius the king, in the sixth month､ on the first of the month came the word of Yahweh, by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ unto Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ pasha of Judah, and unto Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest, saying:
content_old: 1 In the second year of Darius the king, in the sixth month､ on the first of the month came the word of Yahweh, by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ unto Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ pasha of Judah, and unto Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest, saying:

content: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ saying,— This people have said, Not yet hath come the time for the house of Yahweh to be built.
content_old: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ saying,— This people have said, Not yet hath come the time for the house of Yahweh to be built.

content: 3 Therefore hath come the word of Yahweh by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ saying:
content_old: 3 Therefore hath come the word of Yahweh by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ saying:

content: 4 Is it a time that ye yourselves should be dwelling in your own panelled houses? and this house be in ruins?
content_old: 4 Is it a time that ye yourselves should be dwelling in your own panelled houses? and this house be in ruins?

content: 5 Now therefore､ Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Apply your heart unto your own experience,—
content_old: 5 Now therefore､ Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Apply your heart unto your own experience,—

content: 6 Ye have sown much､ but have brought in little､ Have eaten､ and not been filled､ Have drunk､ and not been satisfied with drink, Have clothed you､ and none hath been warm,— And he that hath hired himself out hath put his wages into a bag with holes.
content_old: 6 Ye have sown much､ but have brought in little､ Have eaten､ and not been filled､ Have drunk､ and not been satisfied with drink, Have clothed you､ and none hath been warm,— And he that hath hired himself out hath put his wages into a bag with holes.

content: 7 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Apply your heart to your own experience:
content_old: 7 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Apply your heart to your own experience:

content: 8 Ascend the mountain—and bring in wood and build the house,— That I may be pleased therewith and get myself glory､ Saith Yahweh.
content_old: 8 Ascend the mountain—and bring in wood and build the house,— That I may be pleased therewith and get myself glory､ Saith Yahweh.

content: 9 When ye looked for much then lo! it came to little, When ye brought it home then I did blow into it,— Because of what? Demandeth Yahweh of hosts, Because of my house､ the which is in ruins､ while ye keep running every man to his own house.
content_old: 9 When ye looked for much then lo! it came to little, When ye brought it home then I did blow into it,— Because of what? Demandeth Yahweh of hosts, Because of my house､ the which is in ruins､ while ye keep running every man to his own house.

content: 10 Wherefore—on your account Have the heavens held back dew,— And the earth held back her fruit;
content_old: 10 Wherefore—on your account Have the heavens held back dew,— And the earth held back her fruit;

content: 11 And I have called for drought､ Upon the land and upon the mountains､ and Upon the corn and upon the new wine and upon the oil, and Upon that which the ground bringeth forth,—and Upon man､ and upon beast, and Upon all the labour of the hands.
content_old: 11 And I have called for drought､ Upon the land and upon the mountains､ and Upon the corn and upon the new wine and upon the oil, and Upon that which the ground bringeth forth,—and Upon man､ and upon beast, and Upon all the labour of the hands.

content: 12 Then hearkened Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ and Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest､ and all the remnant of the people､ unto the voice of Yahweh their God, and unto the words of Haggai the prophet､ as Yahweh their God had sent him,—and the people stood in awe before Yahweh.
content_old: 12 Then hearkened Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ and Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest､ and all the remnant of the people､ unto the voice of Yahweh their God, and unto the words of Haggai the prophet､ as Yahweh their God had sent him,—and the people stood in awe before Yahweh.

content: 13 Then spake Haggai the messenger of Yahweh､ in the message of Yahweh､ to the people､ saying,— I am with you､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 13 Then spake Haggai the messenger of Yahweh､ in the message of Yahweh､ to the people､ saying,— I am with you､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 14 Thus did Yahweh stir up—The spirit of Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel pasha of Judah､ And the spirit of Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest, and the spirit of all the remnant of the people,—and they came in and did service in the house of Yahweh of hosts their God:
content_old: 14 Thus did Yahweh stir up—The spirit of Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel pasha of Judah､ And the spirit of Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest, and the spirit of all the remnant of the people,—and they came in and did service in the house of Yahweh of hosts their God:

content: 1 In the seventh month, on the twenty-first of the month came the word of Yahweh, by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ saying:
content_old: 1 In the seventh month, on the twenty-first of the month came the word of Yahweh, by the hand of Haggai the prophet､ saying:

content: 2 Speak､ I pray thee､ unto Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ pasha of Judah, and unto Jehoshua son of Jehozadak､ the high priest,—and unto the remnant of the people､ saying:—
content_old: 2 Speak､ I pray thee､ unto Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel､ pasha of Judah, and unto Jehoshua son of Jehozadak､ the high priest,—and unto the remnant of the people､ saying:—

content: 3 Who is there among you that is left, that saw this house､ in its former glory? And how do ye see it now? Is it not in comparison with that as nothing､ in your eyes?
content_old: 3 Who is there among you that is left, that saw this house､ in its former glory? And how do ye see it now? Is it not in comparison with that as nothing､ in your eyes?

content: 4 Now therefore— Be strong､ O Zerubbabel､ Urgeth Yahweh, And be strong､ O Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest､ And be strong､ all ye people of the land､ Urgeth Yahweh､ And work; For I am with you, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 4 Now therefore— Be strong､ O Zerubbabel､ Urgeth Yahweh, And be strong､ O Jehoshua son of Jehozadak the high priest､ And be strong､ all ye people of the land､ Urgeth Yahweh､ And work; For I am with you, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.

content: 5 The very thing that I solemnised with you､ when ye came forth out of the land of Egypt That my spirit abiding in your midst ye should not fear.
content_old: 5 The very thing that I solemnised with you､ when ye came forth out of the land of Egypt That my spirit abiding in your midst ye should not fear.

content: 6 For thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Yet once a little it is,��� And I am shaking､ The heavens and the earth, and The sea､ and the dry land;
content_old: 6 For thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Yet once a little it is,��� And I am shaking､ The heavens and the earth, and The sea､ and the dry land;

content: 7 And I will shake all the nations, And the delight of all the nations shall come in,— And I will fill this house with glory, Saith Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 7 And I will shake all the nations, And the delight of all the nations shall come in,— And I will fill this house with glory, Saith Yahweh of hosts.

content: 8 Mine is the silver and Mine the gold, Declareth Yahweh of hosts:
content_old: 8 Mine is the silver and Mine the gold, Declareth Yahweh of hosts:

content: 9 Greater shall be the last glory of this house than the first, Saith Yahweh of hosts,— And in this place will I give prosperity, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 9 Greater shall be the last glory of this house than the first, Saith Yahweh of hosts,— And in this place will I give prosperity, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.

content: 10 On the twenty-fourth of the ninth month, in the second year of Darius came the word of Yahweh unto Haggai the prophet､ saying:
content_old: 10 On the twenty-fourth of the ninth month, in the second year of Darius came the word of Yahweh unto Haggai the prophet､ saying:

content: 11 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— I pray you､ ask the priests a direction saying:
content_old: 11 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— I pray you､ ask the priests a direction saying:

content: 12 If a man carry holy flesh in the skirt of his garment､ And then toucheth with his skirt bread or a cooked dish or wine or oil or any food Shall it be holy? And the priests answered and said､ No.
content_old: 12 If a man carry holy flesh in the skirt of his garment､ And then toucheth with his skirt bread or a cooked dish or wine or oil or any food Shall it be holy? And the priests answered and said､ No.

content: 13 Then said Haggai, If one who is defiled for a dead person touch any of these Shall it be defiled? And the priests answered and said､ It shall be defiled.
content_old: 13 Then said Haggai, If one who is defiled for a dead person touch any of these Shall it be defiled? And the priests answered and said､ It shall be defiled.

content: 14 Then answered Haggai and said､ So is this people and So is this nation before me､ Declareth Yahweh, And so is every work of their hands,— Therefore whatsoever they offer there is defiled.
content_old: 14 Then answered Haggai and said､ So is this people and So is this nation before me､ Declareth Yahweh, And so is every work of their hands,— Therefore whatsoever they offer there is defiled.

content: 15 Now therefore､ I pray you apply your heart, from this day and upwards,— So long as there had not been laid one stone upon another in the temple of Yahweh
content_old: 15 Now therefore､ I pray you apply your heart, from this day and upwards,— So long as there had not been laid one stone upon another in the temple of Yahweh

content: 16 So long were things thus､ that On coming unto a heap of twenty then was it found to be ten,— On coming unto the vat to draw off fifty measures then were there found to be twenty.
content_old: 16 So long were things thus､ that On coming unto a heap of twenty then was it found to be ten,— On coming unto the vat to draw off fifty measures then were there found to be twenty.

content: 17 I smote you with blight and with mildew and with hail, in all the work of your hands,— Yet ye did not return unto me､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 17 I smote you with blight and with mildew and with hail, in all the work of your hands,— Yet ye did not return unto me､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 18 Apply your heart､ I pray you､ From this day and upwards,— From the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month､ Even from the day when was founded the temple of Yahweh apply your heart:
content_old: 18 Apply your heart､ I pray you､ From this day and upwards,— From the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month､ Even from the day when was founded the temple of Yahweh apply your heart:

content: 19 Is the seed yet in the store-house? Howbeit though at present neither the vine nor the fig-tree nor the pomegranate nor the olive tree hath brought forth From this very day will I bless you.
content_old: 19 Is the seed yet in the store-house? Howbeit though at present neither the vine nor the fig-tree nor the pomegranate nor the olive tree hath brought forth From this very day will I bless you.

content: 20 Then came the word of Yahweh､ the second time､ unto Haggai, on the twenty-fourth of the month､ saying:
content_old: 20 Then came the word of Yahweh､ the second time､ unto Haggai, on the twenty-fourth of the month､ saying:

content: 21 Speak thou unto Zerubbabel､ pasha of Judah､ saying､— I am shaking､ the heavens and the earth;
content_old: 21 Speak thou unto Zerubbabel､ pasha of Judah､ saying､— I am shaking､ the heavens and the earth;

content: 22 And I will overturn the throne of kingdoms, And will destroy the strength of the kingdoms of the nations,— And I will overturn the chariots､ and them who ride therein, And horses and their riders shall come down､ every man by the sword of his brother.
content_old: 22 And I will overturn the throne of kingdoms, And will destroy the strength of the kingdoms of the nations,— And I will overturn the chariots､ and them who ride therein, And horses and their riders shall come down､ every man by the sword of his brother.
